mapper.select: SELECT e.eno, e.name, e.number, t.name as team, p.name as position FROM employee e LEFT JOIN position p ON e.position = p.pno LEFT JOIN team t ON e.team = t.tno ORDER BY eno DESC;

SELECT e.eno, e.name, e.number, t.name as team, p.name as position FROM employee e LEFT JOIN position p ON e.position = p.pno LEFT JOIN team t ON e.team = t.tno ORDER BY eno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize} ;
mapper.insert: insert into employee (name, number, position, team) values (#{name}, #{number}, #{position}, #{team});
